subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored in the second, backhanding a rebound past the Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist, and the Penguins took their first lead of this series and defeated the Rangers.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored in the second, backhanding a rebound past the Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist, and the Penguins took their first lead of this series and defeated the Rangers.
